sql-descriptor.sql: WITH T1 ( PKCL_CORP_CODE ,PKCL_COME_CODE ,PKCL_TABL_ID ,PKCL_COLM_ID ,PKCL_SORT_NUMB ,PKCL_COLM_NAME ,PKCL_DATA_TYPE ,PKCL_DATA_LENG ,PKCL_COLM_ALGN ,PKCL_WITH_SCRN ,PKCL_DISP_ALLW ,PKCL_UPDT_DATE ,PKCL_UPDT_CMAN ,PKCL_INIT_DATE ,PKCL_INIT_CMAN ) AS ( SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSP', 'HOSP_CORP_CODE', 1, '법인코드', 'VARCHAR', '4', 'L', '60', 'Y', '20240505 19:07:46', 'SYSTEMPK', '20240505 19:07:46', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSP', 'HOSP_STND_GUBN', 2, '표준구분', 'CHAR', '1', 'C', '40', 'Y', '20240505 19:07:46', 'SYSTEMPK', '20240505 19:07:46', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSP', 'HOSP_STND_DEGR', 3, '개정차수 ', 'VARCHAR', '10', 'L', '80', 'Y', '20240505 19:07:46', 'SYSTEMPK', '20240505 19:07:46', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSP', 'HOSP_PROC_SEQ0', 4, '공정SEQ', 'NUMBER', '5', 'R', '40', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEMPK', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSP', 'HOSP_PROC_GUBN', 5, '공정구분', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '60', 'Y', '20240505 19:07:46', 'SYSTEMPK', '20240505 19:07:46', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSP', 'HOSP_HOSE_CODE', 6, 'HOSE종류', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '60', 'Y', '20240505 19:07:46', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240505 19:07:46', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSP', 'HOSP_INJT_GUBN', 7, '압출종류분류', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '60', 'Y', '20240505 19:07:46', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240505 19:07:46', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSP', 'HOSP_UJIK_CODE', 8, '유직사종류', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '60', 'Y', '20240505 19:07:46', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240505 19:07:46', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSP', 'HOSP_SHAP_CODE', 9, '제품형상', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '60', 'Y', '20240505 19:07:46', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240505 19:07:46', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSP', 'HOSP_SHAP_GRP2', 10, '제품형상분류2', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '60', 'Y', '20240505 19:07:46', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240505 19:07:46', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSP', 'HOSP_IN00_CODE', 11, '재질종류', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '60', 'Y', '20240505 19:07:46', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240505 19:07:46', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSP', 'HOSP_PROD_CODE', 12, '제품구분', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '60', 'Y', '20240505 19:07:46', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240505 19:07:46', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSP', 'HOSP_WASH_CODE', 13, '세척구분', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '60', 'Y', '20240505 19:07:46', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240505 19:07:46', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSP', 'HOSP_IN00_MIN0', 14, '압출내경 MIN (초과)', 'NUMBER', '10,2', 'R', '80', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSP', 'HOSP_IN00_MAX0', 15, '압출내경 MAX (이하)', 'NUMBER', '10,2', 'R', '80', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSP', 'HOSP_OUT0_MIN0', 16, '압출외경 MIN (초과)', 'NUMBER', '10,2', 'R', '80', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSP', 'HOSP_OUT0_MAX0', 17, '압출외경 MAX (이하)', 'NUMBER', '10,2', 'R', '80', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSP', 'HOSP_NET0_MIN0', 18, 'NET길이 MIN (초과)', 'NUMBER', '10,2', 'R', '80', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSP', 'HOSP_NET0_MAX0', 19, 'NET길이 MAX (이하)', 'NUMBER', '10,2', 'R', '80', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSP', 'HOSP_MGM0_MIN0', 20, 'm당중량 MIN (초과)', 'NUMBER', '10,2', 'R', '80', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSP', 'HOSP_MGM0_MAX0', 21, 'm당중량 MAX (이하)', 'NUMBER', '10,2', 'R', '80', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSP', 'HOSP_PROC_NAME', 22, '가공명', 'VARCHAR', '50', 'L', '120', 'Y', '20240505 19:07:46', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240505 19:07:46', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSP', 'HOSP_NET0_CYTM', 23, 'NET C/T', 'NUMBER', '10,2', 'R', '80', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSP', 'HOSP_NET0_COEF1', 24, 'NET C/T 계수1', 'NUMBER', '20,6', 'R', '120', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSP', 'HOSP_NET0_COEF2', 25, 'NET C/T 계수2', 'NUMBER', '20,6', 'R', '120', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSP', 'HOSP_CAVT', 26, 'CAVITY', 'NUMBER', '10,2', 'R', '80', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSP', 'HOSP_PREP_HOUR', 27, '준비시간', 'NUMBER', '10,2', 'R', '80', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSP', 'HOSP_PRSN_CNT0', 28, '인원', 'NUMBER', '10,2', 'R', '80', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSP', 'HOSP_MCHH_CODE', 29, '기계장비코드', 'VARCHAR', '20', 'L', '120', 'Y', '20240505 19:07:46', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240505 19:07:46', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSP', 'HOSP_MCH2_CODE', 30, '기계장비코드2', 'VARCHAR', '20', 'L', '120', 'Y', '20240505 19:07:46', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240505 19:07:46', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSP', 'HOSP_MCH3_CODE', 30, '기계장비코드3', 'VARCHAR', '20', 'C', '140', 'Y', '20200421', 'SYSTEM', '20200421', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSP', 'HOSP_MADD_CODE', 31, '기계장비코드_추가', 'VARCHAR', '20', 'C', '180', 'Y', '20200421', 'SYSTEM', '20200421', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSP', 'HOSP_APPL_GUBN', 31, '적용여부', 'CHAR', '1', 'C', '40', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSP', 'HOSP_REMK', 32, 'REMARK', 'VARCHAR', '200', 'L', '200', 'Y', '20240505 19:07:46', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240505 19:07:46', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSP', 'HOSP_UPDT_CMAN', 33, '수정자', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '60', 'Y', '20240505 19:07:46', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240505 19:07:46', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSP', 'HOSP_UPDT_DATE', 34, '수정일', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '60', 'Y', '20240505 19:07:46', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240505 19:07:46', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSP', 'HOSP_INIT_CMAN', 35, '등록자', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '60', 'Y', '20240505 19:07:46', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240505 19:07:46', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSP', 'HOSP_INIT_DATE', 36, '등록일', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '60', 'Y', '20240505 19:07:46', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240505 19:07:46', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL ) SELECT CASE WHEN B.TABLE_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END CREATED_YN ,CASE WHEN C.COMMENTS IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END COMMENTS_YN ,CASE WHEN D.PKCL_CORP_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END CHK_YN ,CASE WHEN D.PKCL_UPDT_DATE >= A.PKCL_UPDT_DATE THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END UPDATED_YN ,CASE WHEN D.PKCL_CORP_CODE IS NULL THEN 'I' WHEN A.PKCL_UPDT_DATE > D.PKCL_UPDT_DATE THEN 'U' WHEN A.PKCL_COLM_ALGN != D.PKCL_COLM_ALGN THEN 'U' WHEN A.PKCL_WITH_SCRN != D.PKCL_WITH_SCRN THEN 'U' ELSE 'X' END MG_MODE ,A.* FROM T1 A LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_TAB_COLUMNS B ON B.TABLE_NAME = A.PKCL_TABL_ID AND B.COLUMN_NAME = A.PKCL_COLM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_COL_COMMENTS C ON C.TABLE_NAME = A.PKCL_TABL_ID AND C.COLUMN_NAME = A.PKCL_COLM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CITBPKCL D ON D.PKCL_CORP_CODE = A.PKCL_CORP_CODE AND D.PKCL_COME_CODE = A.PKCL_COME_CODE AND D.PKCL_TABL_ID = A.PKCL_TABL_ID AND D.PKCL_COLM_ID = A.PKCL_COLM_ID ORDER BY A.PKCL_SORT_NUMB

CREATE TABLE CATBHOSP ( HOSP_CORP_CODE VARCHAR2(4) ,HOSP_STND_GUBN CHAR(1) ,HOSP_STND_DEGR VARCHAR2(10) ,HOSP_PROC_SEQ0 NUMBER(5, 0) ,HOSP_PROC_GUBN VARCHAR2(8) ,HOSP_HOSE_CODE VARCHAR2(8) ,HOSP_INJT_GUBN VARCHAR2(8) ,HOSP_UJIK_CODE VARCHAR2(8) ,HOSP_SHAP_CODE VARCHAR2(8) ,HOSP_SHAP_GRP2 VARCHAR2(8) ,HOSP_IN00_CODE VARCHAR2(8) ,HOSP_PROD_CODE VARCHAR2(8) ,HOSP_WASH_CODE VARCHAR2(8) ,HOSP_IN00_MIN0 NUMBER(10, 2) ,HOSP_IN00_MAX0 NUMBER(10, 2) ,HOSP_OUT0_MIN0 NUMBER(10, 2) ,HOSP_OUT0_MAX0 NUMBER(10, 2) ,HOSP_NET0_MIN0 NUMBER(10, 2) ,HOSP_NET0_MAX0 NUMBER(10, 2) ,HOSP_MGM0_MIN0 NUMBER(10, 2) ,HOSP_MGM0_MAX0 NUMBER(10, 2) ,HOSP_PROC_NAME VARCHAR2(50) ,HOSP_NET0_CYTM NUMBER(10, 2) ,HOSP_NET0_COEF1 NUMBER(20, 6) ,HOSP_NET0_COEF2 NUMBER(20, 6) ,HOSP_CAVT NUMBER(10, 2) ,HOSP_PREP_HOUR NUMBER(10, 2) ,HOSP_PRSN_CNT0 NUMBER(10, 2) ,HOSP_MCHH_CODE VARCHAR2(20) ,HOSP_MCH2_CODE VARCHAR2(20) ,HOSP_MCH3_CODE VARCHAR(20) ,HOSP_MADD_CODE VARCHAR(20) ,HOSP_APPL_GUBN CHAR(1) ,HOSP_REMK VARCHAR2(200) ,HOSP_UPDT_CMAN VARCHAR2(8) ,HOSP_UPDT_DATE VARCHAR2(8) ,HOSP_INIT_CMAN VARCHAR2(8) ,HOSP_INIT_DATE VARCHAR2(8) ,CONSTRAINT CATBHOSP_PK PRIMARY KEY( HOSP_CORP_CODE ,HOSP_STND_GUBN ,HOSP_STND_DEGR ,HOSP_PROC_SEQ0 ,HOSP_PROC_GUBN ) )
WITH T1 (C1, C2) AS ( SELECT 'CORP_CODE','법인코드' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'COME_CODE','공법' FROM DUAL ) SELECT * FROM T1
